nodes.text: The Brigian penteconter was a model of large warship used by the empire of the Tionese warlord Xim the Despot. Named for the planet Brigia, the starships were believed to be cruiser-class by Ximologist historians thousands of years after the reign of Xim.
Brigian penteconter were first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, a reference book released in 2012 and written by Jason Fry.
